title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 606.3 - Statutory authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 606.3 - Statutory authority

State Regulations
(a) Section
13.09
of
the Mental Hygiene Law grants the commissioner the power to adopt rules and
regulations which are necessary to implement any matter under his or her
jurisdiction. (b) The rules of the

Department of State, promulgated as an amendment to 19 NYCRR
261.6
require all

State agencies to submit certain referenced documents included by reference in
the agencys' codes, rules and regulations, to the Department of State for
filing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
606.3

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
